channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Outside 54 Hadley Street, NW1 8TA, 13th June
item.description:
The street light is not working I believe the light bulb needs changing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 54, Hadley Street, Kentish Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rain shelter needed, 12th June
item.description:
This is the biggest bus-stop for thousands of passengers a day 24/7 - with more than 20 bus-routes. Please create some rain/wind shelter and seating. Most passengers are not rich, old, working hard in key sectors for society -so please help all of them to make their journeys better.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 114, Walworth Road, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dear Hackney Council can you please address these issues that are taken place all across the borough of hackney there is an increase of high numbers of members of public smoking marijuana,cannabis in public,public spaces,public parks, Hackney Council estates and buildings. There is no authority enforcing this behavior or metropolitan police. It is like a lawless Britain.What action is Hackney Council doing across the borough of Hackney to tackle these issues allowing this illegal activity to take place all over the borough. Corruption or funding issues. Could you please abbreviate on your policies., 12th June
item.description:
Dear Hackney Council can you please address these issues that are taken place all across the borough of hackney there is an increase of high numbers of members of public smoking marijuana cannabis in public,public spaces,public parks, Council estates ASB

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hillman Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 1 Arco Walk, on College Lane, 12th June
item.description:
There is a paving tile/ slab missing and therefore a major falling hazard and I fell myself , twisting my ankle horribly so that I was unable to go to work for one week. I have seen many others fall there as it is right outside our house and needs to be fixed with urgency please. It will be HUGELY appreciated and we will be massively grateful even if a temporary solution can be found .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): College Lane, Dartmouth Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter waste from Pharmacy, 12th June
item.description:
Black refuse bag split open and litter including some sensitive patient info exposed and currently littering the street with wind.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Barfield Avenue, Brunswick Park, London

item.title: Access blocked, 12th June
item.description:
We have to drive to someone’s garden which is dangerous. Don’t get past also there is no emergency access for ambulance if needed fire brigade thank you. Please do something about it

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St. Margaret's Square, Brockley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Noisy, loose manhole cover, 12th June
item.description:
Rocks every time a vehicle drives over it. Very annoying. It’s in between purbrook st and tanner street on the west side.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 153, Tower Bridge Road, Old Kent Road, London

item.title: Glass on the road in the junction, 12th June
item.description:
Junction is littered with glass from a shattered bottle. Driving over it is sending shards flying.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Rectory Road, Beckenham, London

item.title: Constant fly tipping around our bin, 12th June
item.description:
This rubbish has been here for months now and on top of that there is a pungent smell of dead animal coming from under it. Please remove it and do something to prevent fly tipping here.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Well Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
